name: rateyourmusic.com - Dark/Grey
description: A dark grey version of RYM for the late night surfers.
additional_info:
v0.25
I've only recently started using RYM again and am still going through the sections to edit. So you might see sections that are suddenly shining bright. I'm not sure yet how I'm going to do the colour schemes in the queues so that might take some days.
